data.title: Vontier
data.text:
ANGI Energy Systems’ dedicated alternative fueling platform strives to build a low carbon, sustainable future for our customers and communities. ANGI’s full-site, integrated solutions across hydrogen, compressed natural gas (CNG) and renewable natural gas (RNG) have been carefully curated to offer a safe, seamless and future-proof transition to alternative fueling.

Since 1983, ANGI has been delivering leading-edge equipment, software and services, resulting in high uptime and the lowest overall life cycle costs. With a long-standing reputation as a leader in high-pressure compression, storage and dispensing, clients like Shell, WM (formerly Waste Management) and UPS repeatedly look to ANGI for reliable and innovative full-site solutions to meet their evolving energy needs.

Increasing fuel diversity will not only help ensure energy security to protect against future impacts and global crises, but it will also enable fuel retailers and fleet operators to remain relevant and profitable in a rapidly changing landscape. And most importantly of all, maximizing the potential of low or near zero carbon fuels will help accelerate the world's transition to fully sustainable mobility.

DRB powers the car wash industry with market-leading integrated technology solutions that are secure, easy to use, and simple to service. The company’s portfolio of trusted brands touch every aspect of the car wash business, from data-driven consumer behavior research to high-tech point of sale, automated workflows, controls, and conveyors.

For more than 30 years, DRB has drawn on deep data and industry insights to help car wash operators chart new paths to smart, sustainable growth through a steady stream of forward-looking innovations and exceptional support.

The transition to electric mobility is key to a sustainable future. At the center of this transition is the need to create a future-proof EV charging and energy management infrastructure that will respond to the challenges of a rapidly evolving and more connected mobility ecosystem.

Built on the market-leading technology from Driivz and Sparkion, EVolve is spearheading this rapid transition by providing an interoperable electric vehicle charging and energy management platform solution that enables EV charging providers and fleet operators to simplify and facilitate EV charging economically, at scale.

By providing a seamless EV charging experience for businesses, fleets, and drivers, EVolve is helping unlock multiple revenue streams and usher in a new era of sustainable mobility and clean energy.

Whenever you fuel up or grab convenience store snacks, you’re likely to touch the technology of Gilbarco Veeder-Root, the global leader for integrated retail and commercial fueling solutions. From low-emissions dispensers to fuel management solutions, Gilbarco Veeder-Root keeps the world moving.

For more than 150 years, Gilbarco Veeder-Root has earned customer trust through reliable equipment and support, and forward-looking innovations. Gilbarco Veeder-Root is now mobilizing the future by addressing changing energy grid and transportation needs through ultrafast EV chargers, alternative fuels, emissions testing technology, and powerful analytics.

With a worldwide presence and enduring partnerships with global brands like 7-Eleven, Shell, and Exxon-Mobil, Gilbarco Veeder-Root is paving the way to the future of mobility.

Invenco by GVR was created to help our customers adapt and innovate to stay ahead. Whatever form the future takes, Invenco by GVR will be the operating system for convenience retail, producing agile solutions for accelerated growth and value.

Invenco by GVR is proud to offer industry leading point-of-sale systems, payment solutions, site automations, workflows, and cloud services. With products and solutions offered by Invenco by GVR, customers like Shell, ExxonMobil, and Chevron can easily introduce new customer features such as: managing changes, navigating regulations, managing sites and assets remotely, and scaling operations rapidly.

As Invenco by GVR, we will be the operating system for convenience retail. Invenco by GVR reflects our overarching strategy to connect, manage, and scale convenience retail and the mobility ecosystem. We couldn’t be more excited about the incredible opportunities that lie ahead as we redefine convenience together with our customers.

Matco Tools manufactures, distributes, and services quality professional automotive repair and maintenance tools and equipment. The familiar white Matco trucks—mobile tool stores—can be spotted on the roads of all 50 US states, Canada, and Puerto Rico.

Founded in 1946, Matco Tools has been selling to professional mechanics and enthusiasts through its network of independent mobile distributors since 1979. As the automotive technology industry evolves and vehicles become more complex, Matco Tools is equipping its customers with the tools they need to build their futures and keep tomorrow’s vehicles in motion, from software-enabled workflows to advanced diagnostic tools.

We carry just about everything you would want or need to fix an automobile. Our tools help our customers drive productivity and do their jobs faster, and they see the results in their business.

The volume of digital commerce continues to grow, along with increased expectations for precise tracking and faster delivery. Businesses depend on Teletrac Navman for the real-time information they need to keep critical infrastructure running to ensure your next delivery arrives on time.

For more than 30 years, Teletrac Navman has helped its customers move their businesses forward through data-driven insights into fleet operations, vehicle and equipment maintenance, and asset utilization. The company’s advanced software as a service (SaaS) platform tracks and manages more than 500,000 assets for 40,000 businesses worldwide.

In the rapidly evolving field of telematics, Teletrac Navman is leading the way with advances in machine learning, predictive analytics, and integrated solutions that help customers reduce environmental impact, improve safety, and optimize business performance.
